dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.voiceInstructions: Speak using the microphone button or type directly in the box below. For example: "Grilled chicken with rice and vegetables for lunch"
dashboard.trackNutrition: Track your nutrition to see your progress toward daily goals.

analytics.title: Nutrition Analytics
analytics.addBreakfast: Try adding breakfast to your daily routine
analytics.increaseProtein: Increase protein intake to reach your goals
analytics.underCalorieGoal: You're significantly under your calorie goal today
analytics.startTracking: Start tracking meals to see insights

goals.title: Nutrition Goals
goals.targetsDescription: Set your daily nutrition targets to track your progress effectively.
goals.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all goals to default values?
goals.notificationsDescription: Set reminders to help you stay on track with your goals.

voiceRecorder.bestResults: For best results, try to include:
voiceRecorder.whatYouAteExample: "I had avocado toast and fresh fruit"
voiceRecorder.example1: "I had chicken and cheetos for dinner tonight"
voiceRecorder.example2: "Yesterday morning I ate oatmeal for breakfast"
voiceRecorder.example3: "2 slices of detroit-style pizza for lunch today"
voiceRecorder.voiceOrTextInstructions: Speak your meal details or type them in the text box below. For example: "I had a chicken sandwich and salad for lunch"

settings.title: Settings
settings.emailNote: Your login email cannot be changed
settings.exportDescription: Download all your meal data as a CSV file.
settings.logoutDescription: End your current session and return to the login screen.
settings.clearDataWarning: Clear all your data from the app. This action cannot be undone.

emptyState.trackNutrition: Track your nutrition to see your progress toward daily goals.
emptyState.welcomeMessage: Let's start tracking your nutrition to help you reach your fitness goals.
emptyState.reachGoals: Start tracking your meals to reach your nutrition goals.

errors.networkError: Network connection issue. Please check your internet connection.
